lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: What did Moses tell Pharaoh would happen in the tenth plague?
answers: Every firstborn son in Egypt would die
All the crops would be destroyed
The Nile River would dry up

questions.text: What did Moses tell the Israelites to do so the Lord would pass over their home?
answers: Spread lamb's blood on their doorframe and stay inside

questions.text: What did the Israelites do after Moses' instructions?
answers: Worshiped God and did everything God commanded

questions.text: What happened during the tenth plague?
answers: God's angel struck every firstborn son in Egypt and passed over Israel
A great storm destroyed the land
Darkness covered Egypt for a week

questions.text: What did Pharaoh do after the tenth plague?
answers: Begged Moses and the Israelites to leave
Asked Moses to stay and help Egypt
Refused to let the people go
Decided to give the land of Egypt to the Israelites

questions.text: What did the Egyptian people do as the Israelites left?
answers: Gave them expensive gold, silver, and clothes
Tried to stop them from leaving

questions.text: What was the name of the meal God commanded his people to celebrate each year?
What did the Israelites eat at the Passover?
answers: Roasted lamb, bitter herbs, bread without yeast

questions.text: What were the Israelites to do at the Passover?
answers: Hold their walking stick, belt tucked in, ready to leave
Sit and relax for the night
Take a nap after the meal

questions.text: How long had the people of Israel been in Egypt before they left?
